items.question: How many sites can I monitor?
items.answer: Free plan: 3 sites. Base plan ($19.9/mo): 5 sites. Pro plan ($39.9/mo): 10 sites. Perfect for solo entrepreneurs managing multiple projects.

items.question: Which platforms do you support?
items.answer: Currently: Google Analytics 4, Stripe, and Uptime monitoring. We're adding Lemon Squeezy, Shopify, and Cloudflare Analytics soon.

items.question: How often does data sync?
items.answer: Free: Every 48 hours. Base: Every 6 hours. Pro: Every 60 minutes. All plans show real-time data once synced.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Yes! Your API keys are encrypted with AES-256-CBC before storage. We use industry-standard security practices and never access your actual data.

items.question: Can I export my data?
items.answer: Yes! Pro plan includes CSV and Excel export. Perfect for monthly reports or sharing with clients.

items.question: Do you offer refunds?
items.answer: Yes! We offer a 14-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied, we'll refund your payment, no questions asked.
